Package core

Class ComparisonService

java.lang.Object
core.ComparisonService
public class ComparisonService
extends java.lang.Object
the Comparator will compare two given tests or list of tests by making commands to compare each test and assigns the commands to a thread. when the calculations are done, it will use the given Aggregation Strategy to return a final similarity measurement

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ComparisonService()  
    ComparisonService​(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService threadPool)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String[] listwiseCompare​(java.util.List<java.util.List<DataRepresentation>> testsuites, ListwiseComparisonStrategy strategy, AggregationStrategy[] aggregations, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl, boolean useThreadPool)
    Compares all the testsuites provided with a thread pool and the provided listwise metric, then returns a final value using the provided aggregation strategy
    java.lang.String[] pairwiseCompare​(java.util.List<Tuple<DataRepresentation,​DataRepresentation>> testCasePairs, PairwiseComparisonStrategy strategy, AggregationStrategy[] aggregations, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl, boolean useThreadPool)
    Compares all the tests provided by testSuite1 with testSuite2 using the provided pairwise metric and a thread pool, then returns a final value using the provided aggregation strategy

  • Method Details

    • pairwiseCompare

      public java.lang.String[] pairwiseCompare​(java.util.List<Tuple<DataRepresentation,​DataRepresentation>> testCasePairs, PairwiseComparisonStrategy strategy, AggregationStrategy[] aggregations, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl, boolean useThreadPool) throws java.lang.Exception
      Compares all the tests provided by testSuite1 with testSuite2 using the provided pairwise metric and a thread pool, then returns a final value using the provided aggregation strategy
      Parameters:
      testCasePairs - the list of test case pairs
      strategy - the strategy to use to compare the tests
      aggregations - the aggregation metrics to use to assimilate all the comparisons
      Returns:
      an array of strings, where each string is the result of an aggregation strategy
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • listwiseCompare

      public java.lang.String[] listwiseCompare​(java.util.List<java.util.List<DataRepresentation>> testsuites, ListwiseComparisonStrategy strategy, AggregationStrategy[] aggregations, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl, boolean useThreadPool) throws java.lang.Exception
      Compares all the testsuites provided with a thread pool and the provided listwise metric, then returns a final value using the provided aggregation strategy
      Parameters:
      testsuites - the list of test suites
      strategy - the strategy to use to calculate testsuite diversity
      aggregations - the aggregation metrics to use to assimilate all the comparisons
      Returns:
      an array of strings, where each string is the result of an aggregation strategy
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
